metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38850 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
The MPlayer Project mencoder SVN-r38374-13.0.1 is vulnerable to Divide ByZero via the function config () of llibmpcodecs/vf_scale.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38850` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mencoder - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1
mplayer - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1
mplayer-gui - 2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mplayer package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:1.4+ds1-3ubuntu0.1').
